name: Northgard: Brundr & Kaelinn, Clan of the Lynx
description: Led by Mielikki, the Beastmaster, the Clan of the Lynx have an exceptional connection with nature. Proud Hunters, their excellent archery skills and unique luring technique are more than enough to ensure the ongoing prosperity of their people.

name: Northgard: Lyngbakr, Clan of the Kraken
description: The Clan of the Kraken knows first hand how dangerous the sea can be. They worship the gigantic creature, fearing it's brutal might, honoring it's instinctual knowledge, and using its powers when he deigns bestow them.

name: Northgard: Himminbrjotir, Clan of the Ox
description: Led by Torfin, an ancient leader who returned to help his progeny, it is known for its tremendous might and unrelenting devotion to its ancestors. While they may not be the fastest starters, once they've gained some momentum, they can crush anyone and anything in their way.

name: Mistover: Dr. Faust's Otherworldly Adventure
description: You can find "Faust" in the "Wandering Dr. Faust's Forest" that is filled with comedy and lunacy. Why don't you join this strange dungeon (full of strange objects) created by Dr. Faust? Includes new monsters and the boss "Faust" using the Tension Gauge for his Stimulating Fists of Annihilation, as well as new consumable items that will not be contaminated by the Mist!

name: Retro First Friday Collection #2

name: Wing Commander 1+2

name: Ultima 1+2+3

name: My Countless Worlds: Enchanted Cape
description: "My Countless Worlds" is a kinetic visual novel about the young goofs from a drama club, who need to get ready for a talent contest while also trying to find a person who planted a death prophecy for one of the club's members.

name: Over the Ruins
description: Over The Ruins (Sobre as ruínas) Is an RPG and survival open world game with retro graphics that try to emulate oldschool computer rpg games. The player can explore the world, complete quests given by the NPCs, collect resources, craft items, vehicles, create bases, etc.

name: Los Cops
description: Become a detective in a multi-genre non-linear TV series. Uncover mystery secrets using acting and hot temper. Choose who will be your friend or foe - do everything you can to restore order in Los Angeles.

name: Flying Pudding
description: Let's get out of the way!Pudding's Little Adventures to Create a Girlfriend!If you're desperate, the universe will help you...Pudding went on an adventure to Create a girlfriend.Will be able to make a girlfriend successfully?First, let's get our hands on the energy of the universe!

name: Dungeon Tactics
description: A retro style party based RPG smashing together concepts from several of my favorite games! Build a party of 6 characters combining active, passive, and reactive skills from 40 different classes.

name: 仙魔令之轩辕剑
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirates Job
description: Forget all you know about the swashbuckling adventures on the open seas. Modern piracy is grim, bloody, and only the toughest and most ruthless gunners can survive in this vicious “business”. Witness all that and more in Pirates Job.

name: Prince of Persia: The Dagger of Time
description: Prince of Persia: The Dagger Of Time is a Virtual Reality Escape Game set in the world of Prince of Persia Sands Trilogy (Sands of Time, Warrior Within, The Two Thrones).

name: The Tower
description:
The Tower is an action-packed first-person shooter created by a single developer. It mixes tense combat, challenging puzzles, and a constantly unfolding story.
It's your first day as a security guard for one of the most secure buildings in the city. But your first day becomes your worst day when an explosion rocks the building, blocking stairwells and disabling elevators.

name: The Patcher
description: Feel the full-scale tactical multi-player action game on VR! Play strategic multi-play battles in PvP and PvE at the same time!

name: 至尊传奇英雄版
description: In this game, you can experience the classic legendary play of fighting monsters and grabbing equipment and fighting for the world, as well as the super cool hero system, the combo system and the continuous technique system, which greatly enhances the fun of the game.

name: Super Techpack
description: A charming platformer ripped straight from the arcades. Run, shoot, climb and chomp your way to victory.

name: Goosen't: Run or Die
description: Help Duk, a goose wizard cursed to run endlessly or else perish, break the hex placed upon him by a demon in this fast-paced 2D platformer.

name: Love and Enchants
description: A casual puzzle lewd game about magic, girls and the power within. Using your free hand to enchant weapons for customers and the other hand for the...more important stuff.

name: Depersonated
description: An interactive steampunk-inspired adventure filled with a noir atmosphere. Сhoose your path as a young girl named Molly and unravel the mysteries of RainWood town.

name: Mumbai Gullies
description: Come and experience a thrilling and exciting story based in Mumbai, the city of dreams!

name: Uplifted
description: Uplifted is an extremely fast paced first person shooter with an emphasis on movement and melee combat but featuring a selection of guns as well. You play as an uplifted or intelligent Cheetah, augmented with bionics, who has to fight for survival in the world that he does not understand.

name: Granduck
description: Help blind grandpa find his bed by throwing quacking ducks. Be careful, he is paranoiac, and his house is full of deadly traps!

name: Atoll
description: The earth has been struck by an extinction level meteor, eliminating most of humanity. Survive by managing resources beneath the ocean surface in a single-person submarine craft. Test your survival skills to see if you can once again reach the ocean surface and uncover the fate of the earth!

name: Dark Shot
description: Inch your way through oppressive darkness using only a flashlight and 6th sense in this tense top-down roguelike. Shoot, stun, electrocute, poison and blow-up monsters in abandoned corporate offices where resources are scarce and even the furniture could be trying to kill you.

name: Daycare Manager
description: Take care of children, tend to their needs, solve daily challenges, expand and grow your business. Keep the children happy, healthy and educated to become the most prestigious daycare center in the city... Country... World!

name: Red Man
description: A small city deprived of any freedom of thought under a dictator's rule, spread the seed of resistance and free people from oppression!

name: Squad of Dangerous
description: War is going on. Go on 2d action missions, collect resources, cooperate with friends, send supplies to the frontline and watch the global war progress on the world map. Together, we'll get back our homeland!

name: 昆仑
description: "Kunlun" is developed using the Unreal 4 engine. This series tells about the future war between humans and artificial intelligence aggregates and multi-alien races from extragalactic galaxies. The game builds a brand new sci-fi world from a unique perspective. Players will play an interstellar ranger in the world of "Kunlun", and use the unique interactive system to take risks in the vast sci-fi world with their partners.

name: Payback time
description: Payback time pays homage to retro side-scrolling beat 'em ups, with its old-school graphics and music. A dangerous and powerful crime syndicate has taken over the city and the citizens need your help.

name: Hellbreath
description: Inspired on an old MMORPG, hellbreath will introduce you in the constant war between Aresden, the followers of the god Aresien, and Elvine, the followers of the god Eldeniel. Join the battle!

name: Rescue Teddy
description: Rescue teddy is a single player platform game where you step into the feet of Timmy, a boy who must recover his Teddy bear from the nightmares, but he will not be alone, Twine will accompany you on your adventure, allowing you to alternate between this world of nightmares and dreams.

name: Jaahg: The Crows Cry
description: A nostalgic arcade horror mystery game where you collect clues as you run from an unknown entity.

name: Nothing to be done
description: In this adventure game you explore a sombre world of two people who no longer believe that future holds any change. Spend some time with them to discover if their fears are also yours.

name: Thumb Fighter
description: These Thumbs are hungry for battle. You in?

name: Dabado Puzzles
description: Puzzle game with adventure/exploration elements, where you place blocks, build constructions and collect score items, signs, buttons and many other goodies. Out of the box thinking and acting guarantee game progress and helps you revealing many hidden features and bonuses.

name: Unwanted visitors
description: Fight on hostile planets together with your friends. Get as far as possible while under attack of enemy waves and bosses. Increase your chance to survive by collecting bonuses. Every attack will make you stronger. But don't forget you have just one chance.

name: Manual Intervention VR
description: A real-time, sci-fi planetary defence VR game, where the core game mechanic is to orbit around 3D planets and defend the ground colonies by destroying the incoming bombs. Unlock weapons and tools to gain a strategic advantage.

name: A Night In Kyosaka
description: A young 10-year-old who wanders into a world ruled by dogs, cats, warlocks, and spirits in search of their missing puppy.

name: Tiny Hunter
description: Tiny Hunter is a technical 2D platformer oriented speedrun. You play as an antivirus that has for objective the cleaning of more than 100 files corrupted by a panoply of bugs and viruses. Analyze each file by judiciously combining jump, sprint, shoot and more.

name: Cave Guessers
description: Cave Guessers is a casual word guessing game for 2-16 players. Every turn, one player gets a word. They then describe that word using abstract concepts, while the other players guess what the word could be! The faster someone guesses a word, the more points are rewarded!

name: Lucidus Mortem
description: In the 1930's, Samuel, a man with occult beliefs is contacted by S. Stenfield, an elderly man desperate for the suicide of Alice, his daughter. Through a voodoo ritual, Samuel enters a world that only the dead can access. There he will try to recover Alice's soul... But nothing is what it seems.

name: The Shepherd
description: After finding an old picture of your grandfather on a camel, you decide to leave the city and set off into the serenity of the desert. In order to become a great rider, just like he was. Train your herd, befriend desert-folk, fight predators, and navigate the mysteries of the desert.

name: Glutton
description: Glutton - a game that tells us about a creature brought to earth on a meteorite. The game begins with the level of atoms, our creature as it grows acquires new skills for more effective absorption of biomass, and protection from the dangers that wait for it at every step.

name: Shutter Heist
description: Shutter Heist is an 8-bit Crime Adventure, with a focus on quick moving, quick thinking, and legally debatable puzzles!

name: Home Office
description: You work from home, take care of pets, plant vegetables and travel, living your life.

name: 明末边军
description: This is a silhouette style killing strategy game, players will lead the Ming army in the 17th century to complete the unfinished mission of the Ming Empire! Defeat the Nuzhen tribe, suppress the internal rebels, travel to the new world of America and start an epic war with the European empire!

name: Laundry Simulator
description: A point-and-click time-management game where cats rule. Manage your hectic laundromat and get your cat through law school to defeat Laundrocorp.

name: Night Dreamer
description: Night Dreamer is a single player, side scrolling action game. Make your way across the many different types of blocks while also battling off enemies as you head towards the goal. However, to reach said goal you need to touch special objects in a specific order to receive the key that will open the door to your goal.

name: Archquest
description: Archquest is a classic CRPG that mixes a retro aesthetic, immersive first-person exploration, and tactical turn-based third-person combat based on tabletop RPG rules. Inspired by AD&D Gold Box games such as Pool of Radiance.

name: Grey Lucidity
description: Grey Lucidity is a visual novel, scary, adventure horror game about surviving from the cursed town. Escape for your life! But, do remember that you're not only one here.

name: Viking Berserker
description: In the Old Norse written corpus, “Berserkers” were those who were said to have fought in a trance-like fury. Now, it's time for you to become one of them - to be a great Viking warrior, you need to learn how to be a Berserker.

name: Smuggler Simulator
description: Life at the border crossing is like a lottery - I never know what the next day will bring. People want to move all kinds of goods, and I help them. I love this job.

name: Road to Hollow Hills
description: Road To Hollow Hills is an adventure horror game. Explore the environment, collect useful resources, and customize the abilities of your character in order to survive the Road to Hollow Hills.

name: Hookah Cafe Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to know what is it like running your own Hookah Cafe Business? Let's Simulate It. Upgrade your shop with new types of equipment to attract and impress more customers.

name: Kingdom of the Untitled Magic
description: Get on a magical adventure full of mysteries and dangers! Become a glorified hero and free the kingdom from the awakened ancient evil while forging your unique path through the open world, using magic, diplomacy, or brute force.

name: Nictheroy
description: Explore countless lands, gather vital resources, and build your base. Within this universe, you the player have the free will to decide where to go and what adventures you pursue. Secret storylines, unexpected events, and special interactions will create a journey unique to each explorer.

name: Pogo-Rocket
description: Pogo sticks and Rockets, how could it go wrong? In this space-themed 2D platformer, you control an experimental rocket ship and must stop aliens from taking the Earth's resources. Play through a variety of levels with dangerous obstacles and save the world!

name: The Great Menace
description: The Great Menace is an 'The war of the Worlds 1938' fictional aftermath as an 2D RTS game, after the fake radio drama in 1938, an alien force commences an invasion on Earth the following day, the 5 great powers: USA, Britain, Germany, Japan and USSR must endure the invasion force

name: 魔物调查者
description: No krypton gold! Leisure nourishes the liver! A sincere idle RPG! Become an aspiring young man (what the hell) who dreams of investigating monsters all over the world and travels all over the continent alone!

name: Sundowner
description: You are placed on a small island with the goal of not dying. Work on your base, upgrade your tools, and create weapons to ensure your dominance against a small server of other survivors.

name: Vanilla Inspector
description: This is an inspection! Take your clothes off and stay calm!

name: Red and White
description: Restore color to a vast, empty world. An abstract puzzle metroidvania game focused on exploration.

name: xTypeVersus
description: xTypeVersus is a typing game where players will face their aptitude to type fast, accurate but also to adapt to the situation. Play solo or versus other players.

name: Magic Summoning Adventure
description: A strategy and adventure game Use the A and D keys of the keyboard to control the movement of the character, and use the mouse to fire bullets

name: LumberQwaxes
description: Chop to it!! It's time to get your girl back. You play as Qwackeric in this side-scrolling action adventure. Play through ten lumbering stages. Left and right keys move and up arrow to jump, space to attack and escape to pause the game. Our Hero Heads to Start his new life as a LumberQwaxes!!

name: Plague Masters
description: Plague Masters is a 2d online fantasy RPG centered around the Bubonic plague. Plague Masters Is jam packed with story telling & lore, events and more. Train on mystical creatures, plague carriers and the undead. Follow the Epic quest line from safe city's to infected towns and dangerous pvp areas.

name: Dunnigan's Trail
description: You're a merchant looking to strike it rich. Lead a wagon of hired swords on a trail of danger and hijinks that's a different experience every time. Defend your wares in turn-based tactical battles in this choose your own adventure fantasy roguelite. Make decisions, manage resources, and survive!

name: RhythmSlinger
description: Shoot with style to YOUR songs! RhythmSlinger is a kinetic trick-based VR rhythm shooter that generates fast-paced levels from any audio track.

name: Swoon!
description: Swoon! is an Adventure 2.5 Platformer for all ages. You are an alien who crashed on planet Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship, face the most daring bosses, travel through time and save your friends.

name: Treasure Hunter Simulator 2
description: Once you've found all the artifacts in part one, it's time to test yourself in the new, revolutionary high-quality, Treasure Hunter Simulator 2.

name: May Blues
description: A so-called Tsum Tsum-like puzzle game. Let's connect and erase the substances in his brain that have been sick due to May disease and make him happy!

name: What Happens in Space
description: What Happens In Space is a multi-player survival game where players are assigned a role the 2 sides being, either crew or alien. The crew need to survive while they find the keys for the escape pod and escape.

name: Gobot
description: Gobot is an intense endless platform survival game focused on dodging falling meteors, Lasers, destroying robots, all while collecting powerups and upgrading abilities to help you survive.

name: Dragon's Wandering Tavern
description: Wander the ever-shifting forest as a Dragon Merchant in a Studio Ghibli-inspired, peaceful roguelite management game. Craft enchanted items, brew magical potions, cook delicious meals for your friends and assemble a family of cute and quirky creatures who will join you on your adventure.

name: Heist Day
description: Heist Day is an action packed top down shooter game where strategy plays a vital role. Plan and execute heists as you work your way to the top.

name: Tokyo Rogue
description: Jump and swing across Tokyo rooftops in this parkour platformer!

name: Rimebeard
description: Create, remove and push blocks of ice strategically to extinguish all flames in each level. Use various other elements like rocks, crates, pipes and more to your advantage.

name: Steve's HardCore WorldTour
description: A Speedy 2.5D Shooter where you cruise around Earth fighting galactic terrorists using the power of pure insanity.

name: Junkman Simulator
description: Junkman Simulator, Build Your Junkyard! Repair Your Car and Start Exploring!

name: Call of Myth
description: Call of Myth is a CCG that will take you to the dark universe of horrors created by H. P. Lovecraft. Find your own strategy, crush your foes with brute force or turn them insane. Take the side of the Unspeakable horrors or Defenders of humanity. Choose your own path!

name: Dog Eat Dog: Scam to Survive
description: Things are bad. Rent is late, again. There's no food, again. Your father-in-law needs medication, again. Life is relentless. In this ethically ambiguous title, it's time to set your morals aside, and do whatever it takes to survive. When all you have is nothing, you take from those who have it all.

name: Mythos Party
description: Hack, slash, punch and slap your opponents for the glory of the gods and be rewarded with their divine power! Become a champion in Mythos Party, a free-to-play brawling party game set in a light-hearted mythological universe for up to 8 opponents.

name: Escape War
description: Are you ready for escape adventure? Do you answer is “yes”? Let’s go!

name: Final Foe
description: Final Foe is an isometric action RPG that challenges you to battle treacherous enemies in a mysterious dungeon. Single player and co-op modes. Modifiers and boss rounds. Survive and fight to the end, until the final foe is killed!

name: Doki Doki First Love Club!
description: Confessing love to someone is one of the most intimidating challenges we face in our lives. Doki Doki First Love Club takes this relatable fear to the extreme. This visual novel isn't your average rom-com; it's a fight between two stubborn geniuses in a battle of who will confess first

name: Homewords
description: Homewords is a hybrid visual novel / adventure game where you have to stop a child from insulting everyone. Discover planet Orbtüse and it's strange inhabitants in this RPG where combat is replaced by something way more challenging: preventing and solving conflict through conversation.

name: Tower of Guardian
description: Tower of Guardian , is 2D Fantasy Platformer RPG, tells about adventure of a wizard princess from Kingdom called "Aluria" exploring The Tower of Darkness

name: MyHoriZen
description: MyHoriZen is a meditation aid that lets you create an environment you find comfortable. It features a variety of locations and music to help you find your zen. You can also add objects to each environment to further let you customize your experience.

name: Vandalhalla
description: Have fun in the online Fast FPS Vandalhalla ! Play in team to stomp on your opponents with more than fourty weapons and abilities, experience the Shifumi concept with a total freedom in your loadout, and interact with your surroundings !

name: Kungfu Football Captain
description: Pixel style, violent football, class rouguelike, football manager.

name: The Exomachinist
description: Explore a strange alien world in this real-time strategy/action game and fight the forces of the Exomachinist.

name: Professional Soldier
description: Stand on guard of global safety, wage wars no one hears about, or start new ones. Once you have been a soldier. Choose between justice and money. Now you are a… Professional Soldier.

name: The Exclusion Zone Online
description: MMO First-person shooter with RPG elements. The usual laws do not apply here, there are no police and law enforcement agencies - so the zone attracts people who want to avoid justice. And various anomalies and their creations attract scientists, mercenaries, hungry for profit, and ordinary stalkers.

name: Zeriliah Chronicles
description: Experience an epic adventure alongside Vairon the young intrepid warrior. The terrible Floubyhs decided to invite themselves to the village of Yatapah and kidnap someone. What is Vairon's goal in this whole story ? Save the kidnaped villager and return to enjoy his birthday in peace.

name: Bunny Flush
description: Just go up, don't look down. You will be addicted to this platform game that will challenge you to the fullest.

name: Fiore I: Daffodil
description: Follow Solomon Knight, a new refrain agent. As he fights against Harbinger for his own sin. Will he overcome his sin…?

name: The Amethyst Stones
description: Zoe explores the intense origin story of her father to identity and find the clues and Amethyst stones to save her sister from a blood illness and survive the lost island from a young woman to a hardened survivor.

name: Fantasma
description: Fantasma is a Psychological Horror that puts players face-to-face with the supernatural. Alone or as a team- make contact with paranormal beings end escape with your life using a variety of specially designed equipment and techniques.

name: What's the Matter? VR
description: What's the Matter? is a chemistry fantasy experience that is based on unique atom and molecule chemistry crafting mechanics. Let your mind run wild in this fully interactable sandbox-like model world!

name: Miss Intelligence
description: 访客您好，01型内嵌式先进互动娱乐统合体正在为您服务，您可以叫我“智姝”。

name: City of Atlantis
description: The legendary City of Atlantis has emerged from underwater. This time you are in charge. Build, plan, upgrade and survive!

name: Flight Attendant Simulator
description: Travel the world as you progress through your career as a flight attendant while ensuring the safety and comfort of your passengers.

name: Barbarian Legend
description: Barbarian Legend is a big war like strategy simulation game. You will take on the role of a barbarian leader who will lead his army to conquer enemy territories, develop his own fiefdoms and unite the world by force and strategy.

name: Our Mind
description: Wake up in an abandoned laboratory not knowing how you ended up there. Explore the deserted hallways and try to find a way out. However, you are not alone. There is something else roaming around the halls.

name: Cold Hill
description: Cold Hill is a 2D pixel art action platformer game. Find your way through dozens of obstacles, jump precisely, fight enemies. Explore forest, caves and mountains. Help people from the forest and find out the truth about who the real enemy is.

name: Narco Tycoon
description: Narco Tycoon is a simulation game about building a drug empire. Manage and develop your own drug factories. Employ the best people in the "industry" and invest in new technologies. Influence local politics, destroy your rivals or take over their business. Become the real Drug Lord!

name: Labirinto 3
description: Labirinto this is a simple game in which you need to get square to the other end of the maze.

name: Die Like a Hero
description: Die Like a Hero is a rogue-lite with turn-based combat, where the best strategy is to attack at the right moment. Fight like a die or die like a hero!

name: Hexteria
description: Hexteria is a casual Turn-Based Strategy and Puzzle game. The concept is simple: each turn you rotate one tile on the hexagonal board, in order to take over your opponents' tiles. Play against your friends or the AI, or challenge yourself with the Single Player Campaign!

name: HamsterVeRse
description: Get on your headset and get ready to enter...the HamsterVeRse!!! Take control of a ragtag group of hamsters and lead them on an adventure full of platforming action, mind-bending puzzles, deep customization, construction modes, and more!

name: Dead Box
description: Henry explores the depths of Purgatory to pass onto the other side after dying.

name: Ammo 666
description: Now it's your turn to survive! Kill various zombies that come in waves at you. Collect points by killing zombies to get new Weapons, Bullets and Health kits.

name: Humanity: First Woman In Space
description: Explore space, empathy, diversity. Feel how it is to be somebody else. Humanity transports you into the body of the first woman to go into space.

name: Teodoro and the Evil Machines
description: TEODORO 's home has been attacked by monsters who are stealing the VITAL ENERGY from his world to feed his evil machines with which they are going to steal from other worlds. Recover stolen VITAL ENERGY and restore balance to your world.

name: Grandmother's Tale
description: Grandmother's Tale is a 2D adventure game about the fate of two teenagers, brother and sister. The game is set during the events of World War II

name: Blimby
description: Jump, swing, and chew your way out as Blimby in this fun, cartoony, 2D platformer inspired by cartoons of the 90's!

name: Brass: Birmingham
description: Welcome to the Industrial Revolution! Lead your fast-growing business enterprise, build and develop new industries, multiply your income and don’t get distracted by your rivals. Show everyone you are the real deal!

name: The Epic
description:
A plot-based Open World, Skill-Driven ARPG in the reinterpreted world of Russian fairy tales, telling the story of species segregation that turned into class and religious war.

The key mechanics of the game are centered around exploring the vast and dynamically changing world. The gameplay is based on an atypical isometric RPG combat system that makes each battle difficult, forcing you to look for an approach to a specific type of enemy.Opponents' blows are strong, and their behavior in battle requires learning and forming tactics or choosing another area for research.
The open world changes depending on the behavior of the player and the freedom of action allows you to play a role, without being tied to be good or bad.

name: Avalon: Sacred Crusade
description: An online multiplayer dungeon crawling first-person experience. Limitless adventure awaits in the retro inspired realm of Avalon. Battle, trade, find secrets, cast spells and explore with your friends or alone, if you dare! What legends will you uncover within this long forgotten realm?

name: King Hajwala
description: king Hajwala Online is your chance to immerse yourself in the real world of drifting. Get together with friends, tune your car and burn some tires!

name: Keeper of the Labyrinth
description: A nonlinear interactive fiction game about identity and self-discovery. Decide your own path through the labyrinth's strange halls, and confront the terrors and mysteries within.

name: Themes of Dark and Light
description: Themes of Dark and Light is a 2D puzzle platformer where changing the colour theme will alter the environment.

name: Uproar
description: Explore procedurally generated worlds, look for artifacts, fight enemies using any item, because everything around is your weapon. And all of this with friends!

name: Lightbox
description: A casual puzzle game about manipulating and playing with light.

name: Light2Live
description: Light2live is a procedurally generated roguelike with crafting, stealth, exploration and asynchronous multiplayer mechanics. Improve your skills and discover secrets as you advance through the floors of this dangerous fortress in search of your missing friend. Stay in the light ...

name: The Cost of Recovery
description: What would you do if someone close to you suddenly went through major trauma? What sacrifices would you be willing to make to keep your family together? Experience the different perspectives and emotional journeys of four protagonists when their worlds are suddenly turned upside-down.

name: Elerena
description: Elerena is a magic-based dungeon crawler that hosts a variety of magic and enemies. With currently 3 different schools of magic that offer unique and interesting playstyles, and more as the game thrives, there is a type of magic for everyone to enjoy as they rain down hell on the enemies they face.

name: Reptilian Rising
description: The timeline and everyone in it is under siege! Confront the Reptilian Rising in this 80's tabletop-styled game of squad tactics. Bring retro miniatures to life on battlefields across time. Fight against The Ouroboros through seven time periods, recruit the best of humanity's heroes, and upgrade your favorites for the fight ahead.

name: Lovin House
description: 【互动漫画】 小屋的故事就像是一部互动漫画绘本，各种漫画小互动，每一个画面都是精心绘制的细节，和小屋成员一起体验故事里的心动瞬间，生活中的细腻，以及旅行中的风景... ... 【小屋故事】 这是一个关于“6个完全不同的年轻人，聚集在一个share-house里，遵守着特殊的房屋生活准则一起成长”的故事。 【小屋成员】 木子，是一个温柔可爱，对生活的充满了美好向往的摄影师，还有活泼鬼点子多的策划师左左、成熟稳重的金融女拉拉、欢乐逗比的音乐人路遥、温柔偶尔腹黑的料理师白泽、傲娇豪爽的互联网公司CEO卓子瑜。

name: Door Smasher
description: A silly fps game.

name: Amnesia
description: Sin descripción

name: Philosophy Fantasy
description:
Duel your friends at university with cards based on famous philosophers!

You just started your classes at Huginn University to learn Philosophy. But in this school, Philosophers duke it out in a popular card game! Build your deck and rise to the top and become the best philosophy student in the class!

name: Haunted Brothel
description: Sin descripción

name: Word Lanes
description: PLAY WORD LANES and have an experience like no other! This is the ultimate combination of challenging, yet relaxing word puzzles! Our trivia is nestled in picturesque landscapes and soothing sounds. With over 5,000 levels of fun and just 10 minutes a day, this game will sharpen your knowledge and help you unwind.

name: Bubble
description: An interactive story that projects us into a Montreal +2°C where humans must survive hostile environmental conditions

name: Wanted 18
description: Discover the animated true story of a group of Israeli cows transported to Palestine during the First Intifada in the West Bank. The cows at the centre of this multimedia interactive app were purchased by a group of Palestinian activists in 1987 with the goal of creating a self-sufficient supply of milk for their community.

name: [OPT-OUT]: Uncanny
description: A fast-paced RPG of shapes, junk, and commotion.

name: Trilogy Kuki Youka Shinden
description: The fight of the Kuki and Yasha clans continues from the Meiji Restoration. Yasha clan member is weaving threads around the heroine Kuki Kyoha.

name: Romance
description: Meiji era. The main character is an ambitious novelist. His work is criticized at the redaction, and he is recommended to write romance novels popular with public instead. Hero agrees, but he does not have love experience at all. This is a story of romance birth.

name: Q: Cue
description: 1895. Main character is a representative of Meiji government sent on culture inspection to the United States. Upon his arrival inexplicable series of mystery murders start to occur.

name: Parallel Harmony ~Getsuyou no Tobira wa Suiyou no Mukou ni~
description: Main character opens some strange door and appears at a girls school similar to Meiji era. The inhabitants are living spirits of fox and cats. Every time he tries to confess, his juniors get in the way. Will he ever be able to convey his feelings freely?

name: Meiji Seifu no Yuuga na Hitotoki
description: Sin descripción

name: Lime Iro Senkitan ~Meiji Nippon, Otome Sakimorisu.~
description:
Around the the 37th year of the Meiji Era (1904) in the midst of the Russo-Japanese war, the small Japanese army, in need of assistance, uses its special flying (thanks to a benevolent demon) ship, the Amanohara, to attack Russia's major base at Port Arthur (Lushun).

Umakai Shintaro, a Russian diplomat originally from Japan, defects and goes to Sapporo to teach at a girls academy. However, that girls academy is not typical - it is on board the Amanohara, and the five girls Shintaro teaches are known as the Lime Unit - girls with the ability to summon powerful beings to fight for them.

name: Lime Iro Ryuukitan X ~Koi, Oshiete Kudasai.~
description:
It was Meiji 38 (1905), the Russo-Japanese War that had begun since the previous year was getting hard. In this severe circumstance, they reorganized the Raimu Squad. The members of the Raimu Squad were the girls. They were just like other ordinary girls who went to schools and yearned for love, except that they had “Raimu”.

Inukai Tsuyoshiro was a young man who was newly chosen to be the leader of the squad. He was ambitious to fight for Japan.
When the young man met the five girls, the new chapter of “Raimu” began.

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1974 Honda CivicRS
description: 1974 Honda CivicRS

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1959 Cadillac Eldorado Biarritz Convertible
description: Forza Horizon 4: 1959 Cadillac Eldorado Biarritz Convertible

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2019 BMW i8 Roadster
description: 2019 BMW i8 Roadster

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2018 Nissan SentraNismo
description: 2018 Nissan SentraNismo

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1970 Triumph TR6 PI
description: 1970 Triumph TR6 PI

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1962 Triumph TR3B
description: 1962 Triumph TR3B

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2002 Mazda RX-7 Spirit R Type-A
description: 2002 Mazda RX-7 Spirit R Type-A

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2019 Porsche 911 Carrera S
description: 2019 Porsche 911 Carrera S

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1963 Opel Kadett A
description: 1963 Opel Kadett A

name: Forza Horizon 4: Icons Car Pack
description: Stand out from the crowd with the Icons Car Pack.

name: Forza Horizon 4: Treasure Map
description: Having trouble finding those well-hidden Bonus Boards or Barn Finds? Purchase the Forza Horizon 4 Treasure map to reveal the exact location of all Bonus Boards, Beauty Spots, and Barn finds in the main game and its expansions (as these become unlocked through gameplay).

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1959 Porsche 356A Coupe
description: 1959 Porsche 356A Coupe

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2019 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1
description: 2019 Chevrolet Corvette ZR1

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2018 Aston Martin Vantage
description: 2018 Aston Martin Vantage

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1993 Porsche 968 Turbo S
description: 1993 Porsche 968 Turbo S

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1993 Hoonigan Ford Escort Cosworth Group A
description: 1993 Hoonigan Ford Escort Cosworth Group A

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2018 Morgan Aero GT
description: 2018 Morgan Aero GT

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1977 Hoonigan Ford Gymkhana 10 F-150
description: 1977 Hoonigan Ford Gymkhana 10 F-150

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1979 Talbot Sunbeam Lotus
description: 1979 Talbot Sunbeam Lotus

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1967 Sunbeam Tiger
description: 1967 Sunbeam Tiger

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1968 Ford Mustang GT 2+2 Fastback
description: 1968 Ford Mustang GT 2+2 Fastback

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2004 Vauxhall VX220
description: 2004 Vauxhall VX220

name: Forza Horizon 4: 1966 Volkswagen Double Cab Pick-Up
description: 1966 Volkswagen Double Cab Pick-Up

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2018 Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 1LE
description: 2018 Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 1LE

name: Forza Horizon 4: 2005 Honda NSX-R GT
description: 2005 Honda NSX-R GT

name: 5 Force Fighters
description: 5 Force Fighters is a 2D fighting game with a cast of unstoppable characters, and a combat system that boasts universal offensive and defensive options. Unravel the story of 5 teens blessed with elemental powers, but cursed with scarred pasts that have led them to a common, but destructive, goal.

name: Kyokujitsu ni Kokoro Arawasu
description:
It started with one sealed letter that shouldn't have been received.

The time is the Meiji Era, a historical fantasy set within a tumultuous Imperial Japan.
One day a few years after the First Sino-Japanese War, a girl receives draft papers.
She bets her life on the fate of the country and meets with an Imperial officer.
The various conclusions depend on your choices.
Using your knowledge and intuition cut through to a yet unseen destiny!

name: Pokémon MMO 3D
description:
Pokémon MMO 3D: A massively multiplayer online Pokémon game for PC, introducing a unique real-time battling mechanic and other MMORPG features. Play with people from all around the world. Hunt, catch and collect Pokémon from the Kanto and Johto regions.
Frequently updated with new content and seasonal events.

name: Showa Candy Shop 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Zero Infinity: Devil of Maxwell
description: In 1968, the city of Yahiro had undergone rapid development after the war. Ryouga lives with his imouto Takane, accepting everything that happens in life as he believes that everything in the world exists for a reason. After meeting a man Rei who did not remember anything but his own name and helping him out, they became friends. Later when Ryouga found Rei being beat up, he tried to help but instead got caught up in the battle-to-the-death world of the Imaginators, individuals who have machine hearts that make them into super-powered beings.

name: Yaka no Shitone
description: Early Showa period. The epoch of castles is gone, but memory is alive. In one of such castles there is now a SM club. Only girls with the huge debts are sold there. Main heroine is one such girl.

name: Darkin.Space
description:
An 2.5D multiplayer online space shooter inspired by the .io genre and games like Warpfire, Nova Raider, Andromeda 5 and DarkOrbit! Available for Browser, Windows, Mac OS and Linux! Visit darkin.space for direct access.

Join short session fights against other players in real-time, chase the best place in the ranking and collect in-game currency for customizing your ships with lots of different cosmetics or for getting new shiny ships with new specials!

name: VulcanVerse
description: VulcanVerse is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) where players create their own adventures, interact with others and buy land to design their own buildings, products and services. Essentially, it’s a virtual world built by the players for the players.

name: I Love Potatoes
description: I Love Potatoes is an adventure game for 7 to 77 year olds that deals with social innovation and sustainable economy issues in a slightly absurd, funny and quirky manner.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Plus
description:
Welcome back to Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza! Spend your nights with us working as a security guard, looking after the infamous pizza restaurant that brings kids and grown-ups alike their favorite foods and thrills at a discount price!

During your shift you’ll get to work up close and personal (but not too close!) with our beloved animatronic entertainers; Freddy Fazbear, Bonnie and Chica! Just keep an eye out on those cameras, make sure our robot friends can safely wander around at night, prevent any damage to company property, and most importantly: DON’T let anything inside your office! (trust us, it’s a long story)

Are you ready to survive a brand new five nights at Freddy’s?

"Five Nights at Freddy's Plus" is a fan-made remake/reimagining of "Five Nights at Freddy's" by Scott Cawthon, officially licensed and published under the "Fazbear Fanverse Initiative".

name: Revomon
description: Revomon is an exciting new online RPG that combines an incredible, immersive virtual-reality experience with the ground-breaking technology behind NFTs. This synergy will allow for the creation of real value in a virtual world by leveraging blockchain technology.

name: Project ZM
description: Project ZM is a work-in-progress vanilla+ hack for the North American (U) Metroid Zero Mission ROM. It is designed to fix errors add new gameplay routes, tricks and mechanics.

name: Drink Drank Drunk
description: Based on the original card game ‘Drink Drank Drunk the game’, Drink Drank Drunk Digital is an online browser based party/drinking card game. (Drinking optional)

name: Stratospiel
description: An indie RPG where a child awakens on a strange planet with their memories erased. As they travel the planet in search of the truth, they meet various characters and enemies that they can befriend or destroy in turn-based combat, with their choices affecting the tone and the story.

name: Death Cathedral
description: Death Cathedral is a very challenging action RPG with tons of strategy elements. You'll need to build a powerful army of the living dead with enemies' flesh and bones within 15 days to kill the devil lurking in the deep end of the cathedral.

name: Wonders of Aether
description: Wonders of Aether is a free-to-play anime-inspired open-world MMORPG by Japanese developer MEKASMITH.

name: Jail Simulator
description: Jail Simulator is the ultimate experience of being in jail, featuring good graphics, immersive first person animations, dialogues, fights and more!

name: Defend the village from goblins
description: Survive against hordes of goblins in this casual survival rpg.

name: Starboy Adventures
description: Your dog has been kidnapped, and that’s reason enough to kill everyone. Starboy Adventures is a run and gun collectathon where you kill monsters and rescue dogs on a quest for vengeance against the pigeon that stole your puppy.

name: The DangerZone
description: No more glitches, no more ID conflicts, no more lag! This game has been built simply & beautifully from the ground up! The best part is... it will run on almost any computer! You won't need a gaming computer for this one... it's a game for everyone!

name: Shanye
description: Shanye is an indie platformer by the developer Mittens0407 about a yellow cube on an adventure through dangerous worlds. The cube, Shanye, has to travel and collect coins to reach the portals at the end of each level, and complete the game in the fastest time possible.

name: Iris: A Colorful Dream
description:
In a world without its colors, stories are told about a time when life was bright and radiant, when the sunlight was warm and nature was strong. While Iris is still young and their world has always been dull and faded, these stories inspire them to dream of a better future. Could these dreams be a sign of change?

Join Iris as they adventure through the unknown in search of the six lost crystals to make the world colorful once again!

name: Ahoy
description: First person multiplayer action/adventure game set during the Age of Sail. Providing an authentic interactive experience of the 18th century Caribbean through sailing, combat, trade and social mechanics.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Devil in the Belfry
description:
Amax Interactive is proud to bring you the newest chilling mystery in the Dark Tales series!

When a series of strange deaths occur in the town of Morden, an old friend jumps on the case. But it’s not long before he goes missing himself! You and Dupin quickly arrive to find a town in panic. Each night, someone dies after the 13th chime of the bell tower. And to top things off, no one can be seen ringing the bell itself! Is a sinister specter to blame, or are illusions wreaking havoc on reality? Find out in this stirring Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: City of Ragdolls
description: Create your own ragdolls wars in your own city in Sandbox Mode, play with guns, melee weapons, crazy vehicles and so much more. Simply enjoy everything you love about ragdolls!

name: Taskforce: The Mutants of October Morgane
description: Taskforce is a tactical, turn based game in which you control a small group of elite soldiers in a series of sci-fi themed missions. Mission objectives might include rescuing hostages, blowing up targets, stealing documents or other military activities.

name: Logic: Electrons Connect
description: Logical game for meditation in which you need to connect all of the electrons among themselves.

name: Lucid Soul
description: A villain protagonist, high fantasy, horror RPG in which you, the player, will control Scythe and his party of Deathtouched as they take part in a story rich conquest through the world of Trebezia. Gods and Goddesses will try to stop you... but hey you're the villain... and being evil is so. Much. Fun.

name: StreamTeam
description: StreamTeam is an upcoming squad-based strategic multiplayer game where you take part in an “away-team" fighting your enemies in space. Learn teamwork to defend your base from attackers, or leave your opponents in rubble. Get creative and become the best squad this side of the galaxy!

name: Big City Rigs: Garbage Truck Driver
description: Whoever said collecting trash won't pay the bills? Hop in the seat of your very own garbage truck and clean up and collect the trash as you manage your own waste utilization company.

name: The Z Land: FPS Survival
description: The Z virus infected the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone or in groups you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by living dead!

name: Wilford: Deep Underground
description:
A top down action game that plays like games of the 1980s and 1990s.

Help Wilford collect as many riches as possible, while delving deeper and deeper underground. Balance the time you spend collecting valuables and finding the exit. Levels get harder and harder as you go. Get the best score you can and challenge your friends to do better.

name: Billionworlds : Kingdoms
description: Lightweight turn based civilization type strategy game, with a great single player experience, but with a focus on multiplayer!

name: Sinistrous
description: Discover an ancient dungeon and battle eldritch horrors in this Lovecraftian deck-builder. With each new adventure, face a unique and randomized assortment of mystifying events, phantasmal environments, and perplexing creatures.

name: Tetron
description: Tetron is a 1-bit, top down, atmospheric, twin stick action roguelite with a unique perk based upgrade system, a wide variety of enemies, depthful combat, and distinct procedural levels.

name: A Couple of Cubes
description: Split-screen voxel fun! A Couple of Cubes is a co-op puzzle game set in a world of cubes. Progress through increasingly complex puzzles to escape the government facility that you are held in with the special abilities granted to your characters.

name: Blue June
description: Blue June is a 2.5D story-driven adventure game with elements of exploration, puzzle solving, stealth and horror. Play as June, a student of the prestigious Rose Hill Academy, and uncover the truth that lies beneath her recurring nightmares.

name: Remote Knights Online
description: A faction-based openworld action RPG with survival elements. Playable in multiplayer, singleplayer and self-hosted mode with custom ruleset. Can you survive the rough world of Vall Tir?

name: Flow Gear Racing
description: Challenge your friends and compete against the computer in fast immersive Virtual Reality Space Races. Fly 16 included tracks of varying difficulty and explore your self-built tracks together. Master the extra VR designed flight control system and cross the finish line first. Try the free demo!

name: Humans Vs Ghouls
description: Humans Vs Ghouls is an online top-down shooter following survivors of a ghoul apocalypse that blast foes to live another day.

name: Hard Night VR
description: Post-apocalyptic zombie shooter. Survive.

name: The Legend of Fjarri
description: The Legend of Fjarri is an adventure action game focused on discovering a deep plot full of myths, legends and an ancient fight against an evil foe, all set in a beautiful world for you to explore.

name: Breakout Planet
description: It is the future; aliens came to earth and won the war in a matter of minutes. Unable to stand up to the alien technology, humanity has become enslaved. A ship transporting prisoners has crashed landed, fortunately you are the only survivor and have a chance of escape. Will you be able to break out?

name: Save Data
description: A byte-sized rogue-lite anti-shoot-em-up! Deflect and shoot down projectiles in 3 worlds of crazy bullet-heck action with semi-randomized room order and an upgrade system that provides a bevy of interesting ways to progress!

name: Taiga
description: Taiga is a harsh survival simulator in the Taiga forests of Russia. There is constant cold, wild nature, clean air and time go slower. There are no zombies and geomagnetic disasters, only the nature of our vast planet. You'll have to make your own decisions.

name: Miracle Warrior of Mountains and Seas
description: This is a through the martial arts style game, the protagonist is in a heart of justice of the youth, in the modern times he and his classmates and friends suffer from bullying, in an accident fell into the ancient well, inadvertently opened the door of time and space, through to the ancient...

name: Master of Miracles
description: 《奇迹领主》是一款以魔兽与奇幻为题材的策略养成游戏。玩家作为一名指挥官，培养自己的军队。尝试自己的流派和打法，在剧情，探险，比赛，资源争夺模式中尽情体验无与伦比的乐趣。

name: Suicide Guy: Deluxe Edition
description: Suicide Guy Deluxe Edition is here! The surreal puzzle game set in the dreams of its protagonist. Will you be able to save the thing you love most and overcome the endless whirlwind of nightmares?

name: Desktop Dinosaurs
description: Enjoy watching cute hand animated dinosaurs inspired by 90's Tamagotchi live directly on your desktop. Manage your environment, resources to raise and evolve your dinosaurs during their entire life. But don't forget to show them love! Dinosaurs need love!

name: Terminal Earth
description: Terminal Earth is a survival road trip. The world you once new turned into oblivion, can you survive it and join other survivors in the eldorado ? Loot, craft, fight, drive and solve puzzles to survive and find a way out of this hostile hand crafted open world !

name: Reverse
description: The rotate & flip inherent visual image breaks the limitations of the perspective and formal logic of traditional 2D games. Play as the knight who lives by fire. Use visual rotation and flip to pass obstacles and break the shackles of perspective dimensions. Eventually obtain the eternal fire.

name: Delivery Guy
description: In this game you will come a long way turning from a fat sluggard into a VIP delivery guy who rushes along roofs like a parkourer. And that all takes place during the time of pandemics.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War: Assault Pack
description: The Assault Pack greatly expands your tactical options by introducing a new unit for each faction! These new units are entirely focused on offensive power and mobility. Enact new tactics and bold new aggressive strategies by fielding them on the wartorn surface of Gladius.

name: Absolute Zero
description: A race known as the Snastipods has destroyed the Earth and enslaved its population. Your quest is to help Samantha Snark AKA "Sammy" survive on the Absolute Zero Space Station, end Snastipod tyranny and invoke revenge for the people of Earth.

name: The Grotto Diary
description: The Grotto Diary is a Oriental style horror game. In the midnight, Hua Xiaoxi was on the way home as usual, but she felt the strange look behind her. She never expected that she would be in this peaceful neighborhood, with a sense of evil is following her. Can she get out of danger? nobody knows.

name: Monsters Per Second
description: In this party-based strategy defence game you will visit distant planets, build small camps and battle fierce monsters. Can you survive by learning and exploiting their weaknesses or is your party doomed to never return home?

name: Repeat
description: Repeat is an atmospheric first person single player puzzle game. There is a rift deep in space. Absorbs everything, but it does not absorb you. Stop the collapse. Repeat.

name: Bio Crisis: Evil Hazard
description: Classic Survival-Horror styled Game with modern REemakes vibes. Escape the Town crowded with bloodthirsty unstopable Zombies! Solve the puzzles to make your way to safety. Or Save some Survivors on your way! It's you to Decide!

name: Overdosed VR
description: Overdosed (VR) You are a police officer in the crime run country of Colmbia. Every callout you respond to, you step into the dangers, of an anti-police state. Putting your life on the line, to serve those who matter.

name: Word of Mouth Stories
description: A collection of scary stories that go around a small town. Word of Mouth Stories. Vol 1 is a third-person survival horror game inspired by the classics of the genre. Formidable enemies, atmospheric levels, and the style of old games and movies from the VHS era.

name: Barn & Farm Renovator
description: Change the look and interior of old, dilapidated barns and farms. From changes in design to the perfect final touch. Improvise when you need to, but decorate with style and panache. Invest in the development of your remodeling company and celebrate each successful makeover.

name: The Unnamed Game
description: The Unnamed Game is a top-down hardcore online game where you beat monsters to survive on a cursed reality.

name: Starship Simulator
description:
Step aboard a fully-simulated, realistic starship with 200+ rooms over 7 decks.

Explore a 1:1 scale galaxy driven by real astrophysics, in real-time, either solo or with friends.

Starsim has a lot to offer any space game fan, from Captaining a starship, to cooking for the crew. You'll have many things to repair in engineering and hopefully, not too many injuries in medical!

name: Underwater
description: Underwater is a game in which you are to help a former war soldier to escape a submarine base on the edge of collapsing !

name: Lost End
description: Lost End is a high degree of freedom game that combines text and cultivation. Players will control the protagonist to experience a youthful senior year and capture a lot of orc characters.

name: Battle for Antares
description: Sin descripción

name: Peachleaf Valley: Seeds of Love
description: “Peachleaf Valley: Seeds Of Love” is a romance visual novel/otome game whose premise is inspired by farming-sim genre classics. Dive into a world filled with beauty, nature, and love as you become the newest resident of a lush valley where the sea, the sky, and the land all seem to meet...

name: Nanos World
description: nanos world is the next generation multiplayer sandbox game created by you and nanos. We do this by allowing players, developers and modders themselves to build their own game upon and to integrate their work in nanos world. Built upon Unreal Engine 4, nanos framework and our experience, especially from Just Cause 3: Multiplayer and other modifications we created, you can turn your world into whatever you’d like. Bringing all participants to the table, players can join thousands of different worlds and thousands of different game modes with only one game!

name: Lyrica 2 Stars Align
description: Sin descripción

name: Dredark
description: A free multiplayer ship construction and combat game. Build a flying battleship with your friends and conquer the skies!

name: Catmageddon
description: The legend tells Catlandida used to be a glorious, mystical land run solely by cats. It was prosperous beyond belief, had no crime and more riches than you can count. Few had seen the marvels of this foreign land because cats suspected the dishonest nature of the "Furless"... and rightfully so!

name: I Remember the Light
description: A puzzle platformer game about living in 1D, 2D and 3D, changing dimensions, manipulating perspective and placing gravity portals.

name: Stellona
description: A rabbit western adventure with a large emphasis on exploration and discovery. Make friends. Explore the ruins of a long-dead civilization. Be a bunny.

name: Sketchy Fables
description: Sketchy Fables is a first-person exploration adventure and can be described as a comic book that has broken up over a landscape. Sketchy Fables strives to stimulate Your own imagination trough its various open puzzles set in an open world filled with cities and mysterious places to explore.

name: Parkur 44
description: There is only one rule in the game and that is to know the end of the track you play! You will be given a period of time before starting the course, during which time you will have to finish the game. If the time runs out, you have to start again from the very beginning of the track.

name: Falafel Tycoon
description: Build your Falafel empire in Falafel tycoon! Hire staff and train them to make awesome sandwiches and serve your customers to get more ratings and receive good reviews. Customize your restaurant - with 100+ object you can place in your restaurant to customize, the possibilities are endless.

name: Dante's Hotel
description: Assume the role of Dante, a soul in search of redemption and experience every battle and terrifying events up-close. Explore a mysterious ever-changing hotel in a reinterpretation of Dante Alighieri's epic poem (The Divine Comedy), and enjoy a genuinely terrifying experience.

name: The ordinary case of Margaret Luoni
description: The ordinary case of Margaret Luoni is a sci-fi detective game with a deep story. Help Detective Dirk understand what happened, explore a new futuristic world. There are no obvious solutions here, find your own approach to witnesses and look for hidden places and clues to discovery.

name: Ricochet Bounce
description: Challenging puzzle game with hand crafted levels. Easy to learn but hard to complete!

name: Lust for Speed
description: Street Racing + Date Sim. Pimp your Ride! Win in a Drag-Racing competitions! Earn Reputation! Date the Racer Girls!

name: Kid Meat
description: Play ball tag with your friends in the most appropriate places for kids! Compete with others, avoid the traps, interact with levels and build your own!

name: Guild Hall Adventures
description: Action-packed RPG story, Hack n Slash all monsters in your wake. Build a town from scratch and research while gathering resources and leveling up by killing monsters in the area. Don't forget to delve into the dungeons and defend your created town from the Hordes of Monsters coming to destroy it.

name: Steampunk Timer
description: A Dilated Time Tactical Action roguelite set in a ruined steampunk city where dying is a matter of time. Join the Traveling Theater Guild to stop the city governors and prevent a space-time collapse.

name: Rise of Peles
description: Incarnate a freshly transformed vampire, fight in epic combats and unlock mighty weapons through crafting. Expand your workshops and manage your lineage to craft the ultimate equipment. Venture through the universe of Peles and follow the path to victory!

name: Templar Castle Builder
description: Besiege and conquer the castles and towns of your enemies. Build siege machines and train your army to assault the fortified cities but do not neglect your defence system. Change the course of history, and do not let the Templar Order fall.

name: Wind Up!
description: Wind Up! is a multiplayer, family-friendly arena fighter! You and up to three friends play as wind-up toys that need to wind up to punch each other in explosive fashion!

name: Wildsilver
description: Wildsilver is a JRPG featuring an active-time battle system. With a party of up to four characters, visit towns and explore dungeons, find items and equipment, level up, choose between abilities and defeat powerful bosses. Enjoy beautiful and epic music in an emotional story with plot twists.

name: Charlie from the swamp
description: "Charlie from the swamp" is a metroidvania game about little frog in a big world.

name: Shiver 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Roark's Attack on Titan Fan Game
description: A complex aerial pvp(player versus player) game with design aspects and characters from the aot manga/anime.

name: Space Transport Tycoon
description: Transport/ trade, build and combat your way to become the legendary Tycoon Tai-pan in this sci-fi/ cyberpunk themed space adventure. Grow your empire, design & build spaceships to deliver your cargo across the galaxy! Bring back the luxury liners & explore the cosmos in style.

name: Wastehaven
description:
Take a road trip through a 1970s themed wasteland filled with broken roads, ghost towns, mutants and murderers around every corner. No two trips are ever the same with procedural paths, threats and opportunities along the way!

Originally titled "Wasteland Vacation", the title was renamed due to an InXile & Microsoft trademark conflict.

name: Oroborus: Planes of the Dead
description: Oroborus: Planes Of The Dead is an action RPG with town building management set in an immersive and simulated dark fantasy world.

name: Thousand Lives
description: This is a game as beautiful and unpredictable as life. Navigate what fate throws at you and explore what a life well-lived can mean in this minimalist roguelite role playing life simulation. Life is wild and then you die - a thousand times over.

name: Azzy Battles the Darkness
description: Azzy Battles the Darkness is a 3D action-platformer about technological misuse within an elementally charged land, and the adorable Felko, Azzy, who is swept on a journey that may decide the fate of the whole world

name: Vidora's Silence
description: Take a harsh but breath-taking journey across Vidora as the commander of your train. In this first person strategic survival game you recruit crew members, build your train, mine and explore the open world of Vidora while securing safe zones to expand your reach.

name: Country of Cities
description: Country of Cities is a city building game, where you simultaneously control many cities and regions, managing an entire country. You will have to consider economy, traffic, infrastructure development planning as well as unexpected situations!

name: NeJ
description: A beautifull, immersive exploration game centered around the story of an outcast becoming friend with a puppy. To safeguard the two of you from hunters tracking you, you'll have to embrance your inner darkness and shift from prey to predator.

name: Wilbur's Quest
description: Wilbur's Quest is a puzzle metroidvania about a worm. You've woken up in a strange land and need to discover what lies beyond the surface. Throughout your journey you'll need to push blocks, unlock doors, grow, and discover new abilities in order to progress!

name: Renown
description: Renown is a multiplayer survival experience set in a vast and ever changing medieval world. Players begin with nothing, gathering resources, building a kingdom and fighting to survive in the hopes of becoming renowned across the land.

name: Umami Grove
description: Umami Grove is a relaxed, physics-based VR adventure game with a plethora of creatures to meet and places to explore. Jump, climb, duck, and swing your way though a unique cooking adventure using a powerful movement and interaction system.

name: Broken Legends
description: Broken Legends is an Adventure RPG where you control a possessed 16 year-old. Whatever is possessing this boy is turning him into a villain! Will you stop this force or become it?

name: Mages Defense
description: In a fantastic and unique land, dark creatures seek to destroy the peace of the world and rule the earth. Help the Mages to defend the world against them building traps in their path and using magic in a colorful and happy environment

name: Zombie Hustle
description: With up to 4 players working together online, wave by wave of the infected will be eliminated, can you stop them?

name: Fate of Persephone
description: Fate of Persephone is a point-and-click adventure RPG where your actions and decisions have lasting consequences and uniquely shape your story.

name: Heart Inside
description: You have been given the power to heal people. But resources are limited, allocate them wisely. Walk your unique path as a young doctor in the brutal world of the ruling dictatorship.

name: Beneath the Nexus
description: Beneath the Nexus is the bullet hell that's better with friends, focusing on precise movement, stylish pixel-art, and full parties.

name: Scarleth
description: Scarleth is an action rpg game with magical alchemy elements and a vast world to explore.

name: Niflhel Survival
description: In the role of a Viking who escaped from the kingdom of the dead, you have to survive in the harsh world of ice and fog in Niflheim.

name: Grimstar: Crystals are the New Oil!
description: Grimstar is a real-time strategy game with a story-based single-player campaign. Your brother's sudden death has hit you hard, but the laws of the corporation for which he laid down his life dictate that you must take his place until his contract is fulfilled...

name: Heart of a Bird in a Cage
description: A short story about a bird spirit named Alice. Alice was wondering what her future would be like. Select your favorite story ending for Alice.

name: Project: New Light City
description: You are Max Boston, tasked with solving a murder-suicide crisis in this third person psychological thriller. Use futuristic forensic tools, gather evidence, interrogate suspects, and solve challenging puzzles as you explore the city. Fair warning, Max has to face a few demons of his own, as well...

name: Rustica
description: Rustica, is a peaceful puzzle simulation god game. Discover requirements for objects and place them down in the world so your citizens can interact with them. Each interaction can unlock more objects opening up more interactions. Build from there and watch your world grow.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018: Chrysler
description: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Chrysler DLC includes 2 licensed cars 2008 Chrysler 300C SRT8 and 1978 Chrysler Cordoba. 2 Engines included in this DLC: 6.1 HEMI V8 and 5.9 V8 Mopar LA engine

name: Luminary
description: Luminary takes the Openworld RPG, and dials it in for a balanced accessible experience, with a procedural twist. Using a unique world level and character proficiency system, explore the vast lands together, uncover hidden treasures, defeat large scale bosses, and rid the world’s darkness with light.

name: Slenderman
description: In Slenderman you wake up in your wood cabin in the middle of the woods, a friend told you that the forest might be haunted by a monster with long, thin legs and a blurred face. Are you ready to find out if he's right?

name: Swooping Justice
description: A humorous tongue in cheek action-adventure game. You're an Australian magpie, swooping and pooping on societies wrong doers. Inconsiderate parking inspectors, abusive cops, corrupt politicians, scooter and roller blade kids at skate parks, drop bears... the list goes on!

name: Pocket Pioneers
description: Welcome to continent Qu, your newfound land of adventure! Begin your journey to build a new life in a bustling community of fellow Pocket Pioneers and help the local citizens. Become whomever you want, create your ideal homestead, explore the lands and make new friends along the way! Pocket Pioneers is a new, charming adventure simulation game where you can create memories with friends from around the world, embark on limitless quests and discover the hidden magical secrets of continent Qu.

name: Netherside
description: Stay tuned for the latest news and updates on our momentum-based platformer, Netherside. A 2d platformer with a unique twist.

name: We Are Football: Bundesliga Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier / Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Advanced Warfighter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Saber Punks
description: VR Fighting Game with energy weapons that let you sling attacks at your enemy. Directional combos activate special attacks like stun, spin, and Unblockable. Get active in an action-packed duel that you can play online.

name: RTL Winter Games 2007
description: Sin descripción

name: Dome-King Cabbage
description: Dome-King Cabbage is a visual novel about a cloud-person named Mush nervously making their way to a job interview. Mush has to grapple with their ability to perceive the world through the lens of a monster-collecting RPG. This is the first chapter in an episodic interactive-fiction series. Originally created for TyranoBuilder's Spring Game Jam, Dome-King Cabbage won the competition's gold prize, awarding it $500 and first-place among 50 entrants. The entire work is a mostly solo effort by Joe Buchholz.

name: SacriFire
description: A modern JRPG-inspired game with a unique battle system, rich story, fantastic visuals and music by Motoi Sakuraba.

name: Contraband
description: Welcome to Contraband, a co-op smuggler’s paradise set in the fictional world of 1970s Bayan.

name: Erit
description: Space themed exploration and platformer game in which an alien girl crashes into an unknown planet and must find the missing components of her ship in order to leave the planet and continue her journey.

name: Insignia
description: Explore a colourful world of beautifully animated pixel art, harkening back to the golden age of 2D games. With hand drawn frame-by-frame sprites and gorgeously expansive tile-sets, playing Insignia will have you reminiscing about blowing on plastic cartridges and calling expensive hotlines for hints, no time machine required!

name: Zoria and the Cursed Land
description: Zoria and the Cursed Land is a metroidvania. Inspired in Momodora 4, CHASM and many other games.

name: Sushi Ben VR
description: Sushi Ben is a slice of life anime sim where you play as a customer to a sushi bar that's going out of business and it's up to you to save it! Loosely based on the life of the creator's friend, who he used to work with at a sushi bar.

name: KreatureKind
description: KreatureKind is an approachable and wholesome Card Battler/Deck Builder game about helping monsters, rather than killing them.

name: Dreamland Confectionery
description: Surrounded by vibrant creatures and peculiar characters, Ami finds herself in a strange dreamland full of mysteries and wonder. Bake for others, ride colorful creatures, and solve environmental puzzles to find the missing pieces needed to wake up. Is this more than just a dream?

name: Sally
description: Sally is at the intersection of role playing and life simulation games. You play as a child who, along with other children, recently took command of a flying ship and use it to carry travelers across the world.

name: Kokopa's Atlas
description: Discover new beginnings after crash-landing on an undiscovered planet. Join Kokopa and Pollimero as they explore, build, garden, and meet new friends — while uncovering the mysteries of this unknown planet!

name: Yokai Inn
description:
You are forced to take shelter in an abandoned inn, and the place springs to life with otherworldly patrons as soon as the sun sets!

Immerse yourself in unique activities like maintaining the furnace and sweeping floors, or classic ones like farming, fishing, cooking, mining, and crafting in order to grow and expand your inn.

Yokai Inn is a slice-of-life sim game, inspired by titles such as Harvest Moon and Animal Crossing, that is currently in the early stages of development.

name: Bird Problems
description:
Finally! Fulfill the ultimate fantasy of stepping into the shoes of an awkward canary.

Navigate extremely simple and straight-forward conversations with very limited and odd response options. Delightfully bungle greetings and social interactions with other birds while attempting to make friends over boba-tea in the middle of the afternoon.

Enjoy the goofishly squeaky aesthetic of a late twentieth century sitcom.

name: The Last Cove
description: A gripping, explorative tale of a father and daughter both desperately clinging to life in their final enclave. The father trying to find his daughter one last time, while she moves further from his grasp. Join them on a journey within The Last Cove.

name: OtherWordly
description: The letters of Alphazoid Prime have begun to vanish, and you must solve the mystery. Team up with the Termarians to restore order by matching related words, harvesting life-giving energy, and avoiding treacherous obstacles.

name: Detained: Too Good for School
description: You play as a school girl who doesn't obey the rules. Explore the open world, pick a fight with street mobs, work part-time in a club and then spend all your money in a jiffy, and enjoy a hot date. Your choices will eventually shape the future of the city.

name: Audio Clash: Battle of the Bands
description: Create a band and dominate the competition in this new music-themed auto-battler developed by Big Boat Interactive in conjunction with The Living Tombstone. Take part in 8-player battles and unleash your abilities to win and earn rewards. AudioClash features all members of The Living Tombstone!

name: Nimoyd
description: Nimoyd is a survival sandbox game set in 2702, with generated cities and dungeons, farming, life sim elements, as well as dynamic nations and NPCs, and mechs, and aliens.

name: Tentacle Typer
description: Tentacle Typer is a Lovecraftian text editor RPG experience. You're a giant tentacle monster with a magic mechanical typewriter, and you're trapped in a steampunk mansion. Psychically rouse elaborate mechanisms by typing almost whatever you want.

name: Nainai's Recipe
description:
Open your fridge, choose the ingredients, examine, chop, seasoning, heat, and taste them. During the lockdown, you start to learn how to cook from your dear grandma.

Nainai’s Recipe is a game that captures the cooking feeling in stylized visuals. And a family story about how we lived together in a special way during 2020.

name: Cryptic College
description: Cryptic College is a visual novel in which you can choose romance 11 different characters. But be careful! You never know what someone could be hiding...

name: Vokabulantis
description:
Vokabulantis is a video game about the first time you held hands, where all you see is crafted by hands.

The game is a puzzle platformer, you can play as co-op or single player and it’s targeted multiple platforms.

name: Painkiller
description: New publishing label Prime Matter is bringing back the Painkiller series as part of its initial lineup of games. Originally developed by People Can Fly and released in 2004, the original Painkiller was a game ahead of its time in terms of harkening back to the retro shooters of old and featured over-the-top weapons and plenty of demons and monsters to eviscerate.

name: Echoes of the End
description: Sin descripción

name: Phoenix Point: Living Weapons Pack
description: The Living Weapons Pack adds new in-game missions that unlock three pieces of exclusive, powerful equipment: the Samnu Armor Set, the Danchev AR (Acid Assault Rifle), and the Danchev MG (Poison Machine Gun).

name: Super Funky Ball!
description: A freeware breakout clone in which you have to place the blocks yourself.

name: Godball
description: Godball was a freeware unity game published by adultswim games in which you sling around a giant ball shaped animal monster in order to cause as much destruction as possible to various cities. The game seems to have been pulled from the site, but unofficial mirrors still exist.

name: X Falling Sand
description: A falling sand game featuring a moving "slug" and several spouts.

name: Etch-a-Sketch Sand
description: A falling sand game in which the cursor is controller similarly to an Etch-a-Sketch.

name: Sea Park Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Villagedom
description: Are you worthy of being a king? Test your mettle in this city-builder and resource management game as you develop your kingdom. Face challenges at every turn and transform your village into something mighty. Protect your subjects. Slay your enemies. Be a king!

name: Megopoly
description: Megopoly is the world’s first free-to-play board game where players build real estate empires. We’re currently in open beta and new features are released all the time so make sure to stake your claim now!

name: Ferocious
description: Ferocious is a survival shooter in which you will discover a lost prehistoric world full of deadly creatures under the control of hostile forces. Fight, Explore, Survive

name: Fishermen's Haven
description: Fishermen's Haven is a tranquil manager game in which you take control of a small coastal settlement located on a remote island. Guide your people through the hardships of life on a tropical isle, manage resources, and find the means to expand the village.

name: Tiny Planet Protectors
description: Welcome to the TPPA! Your assignment: Protect, Clean, and Discover. Collect resources and encounter the inhabitants of nearby galaxies as you also fill your home planet with alien plants, futuristic tools, and uncover the greatest threat to the universe.

name: Robot Fishing
description: Sin descripción

name: Getting There
description: Sin descripción

name: Date of Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Daily Driver
description: Sin descripción

name: Oxy Con Brio
description: Sin descripción

name: Widget Satchel II: Return of Sprocket
description: Sin descripción

name: IFSCL: A Code Lyoko Fangame
description:
The IFSCL is an unofficial game of the animated show Code Lyoko, professionally made by a passionate french fan for more than a decade and still in production.
