First and foremost, it's an interactive reproduction of the interface of the supercomputer that the nerd of the group, Jeremy, uses in an abandonned factory to send his friends in a dangerous virtual world, Lyoko. This is also 3D adventure game that happens within the 'real' world of the series.

name: Rise of Hegemony
description: Take control of a country from its very first beginnings and lead it successfully to become a global hegemon. In a complex simulation of economy, diplomacy and warfare the path you chose to triumph is up to you.

name: Rollers of the Realm: Reunion
description:
Rollers of the Realm: Reunion—sequel to the winner of GDC’s prestigious “Best in Play” award in 2014—is a medieval-themed RPG featuring a clever spin on pinball where the ball features attributes similar to a traditional RPG character.

Rollers of the Realm: Reunion features easy-to-learn controls and an adventure-filled game world inspired by classic pinball cabinets. Players will bounce, flip, and dash through physics-based puzzles to progress the story while leveling up a party of misfit heroes on an epic journey to new worlds.

Each character is represented by a ball that offers distinct gameplay modifiers, sizes, stats, and “specials,”—making battles and puzzle-solving a tactical affair where hot-swapping heroes is a must. Sending in a knight to do a mage’s job might not be the smartest move!

name: Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Flick Club
description: A competitive sliding blocks puzzle game with both an 18+ mode and a no nudity esports mode.

name: The Poisoned Roots
description: The Poisoned Roots is a narrative driven game about abuse, obsession, and the dark secrets of a troubled American home. It's a short game, and is intended to be played in a single sitting.

name: Attention Heroes!
description: A currently in-development game about hogging the spotlight from your fellow superheroes.

name: The Door
description: The Door is an escape room game with teleportation based puzzles. Planned for a full launch at some point in the year 2021. The initial publication was July 9th of 2020, and is playable on Windows, and Android.

name: Tuned Turtle
description: Tuned Turtle is a wacky 2D platformer inspired by the "Tortoise x Hare" tale. Tune up your shell with mighty power-ups and cross the finish line before "Loko Rabbit". You are the only hope to save a village in ruins from the hands of the greedy "Dirty Duke".

name: Kero-Go!
description:
You are a small frog with a really big tongue, and you somehow got caught up in an even bigger mess.

Stick your slimy tongue to fling yourself through danger, and save the day in this adventurous and challenging frog-based 2D platformer!

name: Command Heroes
description:
Mullets, missiles, and monsters fly in a hectic, intergalactic resource race. Build bases, command troops, pilot vehicles, collect elemental artifacts to supercharge weapons, level up, upgrade almost anything, and master unique hero abilities. Multiple game modes keep strategies fresh.

Battle it out in a mash-up between a twin-stick action platformer & RTS blend. Play with 1-3 friends for 4-player split-screen action, or a custom map with up to 10 players & AI.

name: Doubutsu Banchou
description:
Eat or be eaten! Assume the role of an animal in it's early stages of evolutionary development. As your animal instincts take over, you will boldly traverse hostile environments, savagely stalking your prey to assert your place in the animal chain of power. Will you have what it takes to become the new king of beasts?

The game started development on the Nintendo 64, but went unreleased, being later ported to the Nintendo GameCube. A prototype of the Nintendo 64 version has been found

name: MiniRacingOnline
description: MiniRacingOnline is a multiplayer racing game in which you will be able to compete with players of any part of the world.

name: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi
description: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi is a fantasy adventure game where a sword–wielding Guardian and an arcane Monk must learn to work together to defeat the Void corrupting their home. Explore ruined temples, solve environmental puzzles, rescue spirits, and defeat giant Void monsters!

name: Varvarion
description: Varvarion is a 3D sword fighting action game currently in development, which puts you at the center of playable, anime-styled sword fights. Flipping and dodging to evade ferocious attacks, parrying at the last possible split second to reposte with a deadly blow, and doing it all with the style and flare of an anime battle; this is what Varvarion is setting out to achieve.

name: Escape from the Labyrinth
description:
When the girl woke up, she was at station on the sea.
She can’t remember why she is here——
The girl decided to find a way to go home,
where her family is waiting——

name: Tougenkyou
description:
Hidden Wonderland drew inspiration from The Peach Blossom Spring, a fable by the well-known Chinese poet Tao Yuanming. The game is set in the late Tang dynasty following the An Lushan Rebellion when the country was ravaged by competing warlords. To flee the war, civilians come to a valley to build a new home.
In the game, the player assumes the role of village head who sends villagers to gather resources, manages labor, grows the population, establishes a village for survival step by step, and gradually turns it into a paradise.

name: Katabasis: Monsters Arise
description: Sin descripción

name: Mekururi Witch
description: Sin descripción

name: Re:Take
description: "Re:TAKE" is the latest fantasy 2D side scrolling combat game! Upgrade your favorite characters, collect rare items that allow you to unlock special skills and spells, get monsters as pets, and join your friends to defeat the hordes of enemies and numerous giant bosses!

name: The Barren Babel
description: Sin descripción

name: Nana Iro Irony
description: Sin descripción

name: Dearend
description: A cinematic action game by Kurosawa Create.

name: Koromu Auto Battler
description: Along your journey across 12 constellations of the Galaxy Empire, you will fight your way out with 12 alien goddesses, until revealing the sacred mystery of Koromu, a long-lost book of predictions for human destiny!

name: Necromance-chan
description: Sin descripción

name: Run Die Run Again
description:
Run Die Run Again (RDRA) is a fast-paced first-person precision platformer, where every inch of the environment is out to kill you! A speed-running, trial and error endurance contest, where fast reactions and acrobatic dodging skills are rewarded.

Speed through stunning sci-fi obstacle courses; executing death-defying leaps, flips and dashes past deadly hazards and skirting certain-death, all with a ticking time-bomb strapped to your back! A precision platformer built for speed freaks who want their hardcore platformers in first-person.

name: Butou Soujin
description: Sin descripción

name: Shape of Stars
description:
This is a story of stars and constellations for you and me.

In the world where all the constellations are lost, you need to collect stars to bring back the constellations in the night sky.

name: Puzzzeni Easy
description: Sin descripción

name: Minesweeper Run
description:
Minesweeper meets an endless runner!

A dangerous run game that takes you through a minefield! Exploding mines will stop the time, so find a way through!

name: Link: The Unleashed Nexus - Restructured Heaven
description:
Aim for the sky.
It doesn't matter if you don't have any wings.

name: The Soldat with Twin Arms
description: Sin descripción

name: Smash Crabs
description: Sin descripción

name: Hamster Panic
description: Protect your candy house from the hamsters!

name: Magical Blaster
description: With these fairies, shoot your way through this high speed shooting game!

name: BattleSound
description: BattleSound is rhythmical battle game by the developer Skeyll.

name: Black Cat Explores Minds
description: The game is about a black cat walking in a maze.

name: Understanding of the Abyss
description:
"Understanding of the Abyss" is a 3D horror game based on the Cthulhu Mythos.
The goal of the game is to provide a still madness.

name: Bigroom Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep Dark Forest
description: 一款不同于传统的RTS策略游戏。将科幻作品《三体》中的“黑暗森林法则与RTS的玩法相融合，带来了独特的的体验。你将要领导文明，发展经济，提升科技，稳定民心，殖民新星系；在遭遇未知文明时，是隐藏好自己，还是友好沟通？在这个“黑暗森林”中如何生存下去，每个决定都将至关重要。

name: Rystel
description: A 2D action-adventure through a world in soft pixel art. The brilliance of the star crystal "Rystel" is being lost. Let the adventure begin to uncover the mysteries!

name: Hello, Goodbye, Summer Girl
description: Pixel Art & Yuri & Cinema! The story of a Bad Girl in Miami and a JK from Tokyo. A Girl meets Girl Entertainment Crime Thriller.

name: MagiCraze
description: Sin descripción

name: Entertainment Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: My Child New Beginnings
description: My Child New Beginnings is a life simulation game where you play as an adoptive parent to a child with a dramatic past. The game is a sequel to My Child Lebensborn and combines philosophy, trauma, care and reconciliation as the main topics. There will also be a simple online function that lets other people share thoughts about these topics.

name: iii: Revolving Wonderland
description: iii: Revolving Wonderland is an RPG by a sole developer using pixel art, 3D & live 2D. Explore a broken world “full of happiness” and hear out people’s wishes as you seek the truth. Will the world end up fixed, destroyed, or...? It’s up to you.

name: The Chewllers
description: The Chewllers is an online, multiplayer, VR game. The project presents stylized and comic nature, where 4 players protect the tower from monsters in Co-op mode.

name: Doradora Panic
description:
This is a mini action game in which a roadie fixes a drum set.
The drum set has been haunted by a ghost !? Operate Mr. Roadie to fix troubles that occur one after another on the drum set. Let's help Mr. drummer play the drum for a long time!

name: One Punch
description: This is Action Music Game. You can beat enemies with music.

name: Jewel of Live II
description: Jewel of Live is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game. It is the second in the Jewel of Live series.

name: Mi'pu'mi' Collection
description:
The Flower Collectors

Barcelona, 1977. An ex-cop in a wheelchair witnesses a murder, and teams up with a young ambitious journalist to bring the truth to light. With camera, binoculars and transmitter in hand, uncover the town’s secrets from your balcony in this soul-searching detective mystery.

The Lion's Song

The Lion’s Song is a narrative adventure game. It is set against the backdrop of early 20th century Austria with every episode following a different character.

The Lion's Song is a series of four self-contained point & click stories connected into an overarching narrative, where player choices will affect the way in which the story unfolds. Set against the backdrop of early 20th century Austria, every episode follows a different character, each blessed with an exceptional creative mind. The game pulls players into a story of personal struggle for creativity, human connections and inspiration.

name: Snow Fighters
description:
This is the Nintendo Switch version of “Snow Fighters” on sale on Steam.

It features a simple yet profound system that creates Yukidama and beats the opponent.
Aim for victory by operating all 6 characters with different stats and special moves!
New stages, new characters, and story modes will be added to the Nintendo Switch version!

name: Worst Nightmare
description: Worst nightmare is a first person horror puzzle game. A game about living through a nightmare.

name: One Hell of a Trip
description: This is a 2D double joystick action adventure game, play as an innocent soul who falls into hell, pick up your weapon and use the power of different magic elements to fight for survival in the dungeon full of traps and monsters.

name: Loop Knight
description: A retired Knight man became a factory manager, constantly producing small Knight robots. And use the robot that passed the test to harass his old friend, demon king, day and night.

name: Revolution Triumph
description: Revolution Triumph - step-by-step strategy for the Russian Civil war. The game reflects the events of the battle of Tsaritsyn. You will have to manage the course of hostilities, as well as monitor the situation on the entire southern front.

name: Flower Paradise
description: Welcome to Flower Paradise! Solve your way through unique flower puzzles in order to turn a patch of dirt into your own beautiful garden! Customize your garden with flowers, plants, birds, butterflies, fish, hedges, statues and more as you unlock each feature using your Match 3 skills. Once you have your garden exactly the way you like it, you can turn it into wallpaper for your desktop, or even an animated screensaver!

name: Snow Survival
description: As a result of a heavy snowfall, the passenger plane crashes on a deserted and cold island. You are the only survivor of the plane and get ready to explore this cold forest.

name: Pendle Hill
description: Pendle Hill is a unique and intense single player open-world survival horror game. The game is loosely based on a real life location with a dark past. Immerse yourself in an amazingly detailed world and find out who you really are and what you are made of!

name: Rocket Stop Incident
description: Rocket Stop Incident is an atmospheric first-person horror game with puzzle elements.

name: Project Bullet
description: Project Bullet is a side-scrolling bullet hell game, which sets in Pistalia, the fantasy world where people get the blessing from their god this power came to be known as ''Bullet'', Escape from the evil empire, find valuable allies, arm yourself with powerful gadgets and destroy all your enemies!

name: Line Leader
description: Take the role of Line Leader, as you and your fellow students try to escape school. Avoid hazards and gather as many students as possible to escape each room. Adventure through different areas of the school, defeating bosses and solving puzzles as you find your way out.

name: Metal Mars
description: Metal Mars is a real time strategy game where you race to gather resources and build on mars! This game can be played locally with a shared screen with up to three friends (4 players total). There are also 30 challenges to complete against the CPU!

name: Beat Bolt City
description: Take to the skies and ride the lightning in Beat Bolt City! Run through the streets and swing among the rooftops with super-heroic speed as you swing along with the music.

name: Under the Island
description: A 2D Action RPG set in a fantasy world inspired by the 1990s. Explore an island, fight monsters, solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of an ancient civilization. Help the inhabitants and interact with the plants and animals of the island.

name: The Little Black Bestiary: A Midsummer Night's Barcrawl
description: A modern fantasy visual novel dating sim where you attempt to woo an astoundingly wealthy fae businesswoman.

name: Tales of Farhollow
description: Tales of Farhollow is a player decision based adventure. You will go on a quest as a new adventurer in town, to help (or harm), the townspeople. Choose your decisions wisely, as they can help you or get you into trouble!

name: Axe Gang
description: Axe Gang is a co-op VR/noneVR game for PC that features an epic battle of four Survivors with axes against the Infected robots.

name: Friend Fighters
description: A 2d beat'm up, fighting game featuring a wacky cast of characters!

name: Gaia 2: Ancient Mysteries
description: A sci-fi base building survival open world game, featuring raids, natural disasters, agriculture and more.

name: Clash of Command: Campaign of 1863
description: There is no "taking turns" in war in Clash of Command: Campaign of 1863, a tactical strategy game! Play with or against your friends, devise your tactics and watch your plans unfold simultaneously, but remember "no plan survives contact with the enemy". Enlist today!

name: SpyNames
description: SpyNames is a spy-themed deduction party game for 4-10 players. Players are assigned as secret spy name and it is your job to figure out which spy is your target and take them out before other players.

name: Dark Treasury
description: The world is in danger! Someone opened a portal to the other world, from which an unknown evil escaped. You are a nameless warrior, and your task is to set off on a journey full of dangers to destroy the evil that breaks free. But will you succeed?

name: Spirit of the Blade
description: Test your combat skills in an epic samurai fight against other players in FFA and CTF. Win, upgrade and customize your character for a unique feeling.

name: No More Light
description: No More Light is a survival horror game representing an alien invasion that destroyed the Earth in 2012. While roaming the countryside of Colorado (USA), your task is to fight for your life.Dive in the unknown and find out whether you are able to survive in the dangerous environment.

name: Cyber-Cat
description: Cyber-Cat is a fast-paced, action, first-person shooter, where you take control of a cat with cybernetic enhancements and outfitted with advanced weaponry.

name: Toupei55
description: Fight terrorists with your friends (or even with your dad!) in this simple couch-coop top down shooter.

name: Cat's Cradle
description: Cat's Cradle is a 2D action game. You fly with a wire and cut the enemy.

name: The Gold River Project
description: Single or multiplayer open world camping adventure game where you and your friends are offered a remote camping trip. One week turns into several as you suspect your guide is never coming back. Deserted, you discover you are trapped in an experiment to see if you can survive.

name: Wteruna
description: A turn-based game, role-playing. Through the role-playing way to deduce a depraved love and hatred of morality or humanity.

name: Raven Port
description: Raven Port is a Free-To-Play Roque-like MMORPG. Crawl trough the many procedurally generated dungeons this game has to offer. Whether you go solo, or with up to 4 others, an exciting adventure awaits.

name: Project Death Wish
description: Crossplay multiplayer Project Death Wish takes you against zombie hordes alone, or with party of four. You have the option for single player survival or multiplayer with different options. You can just quickly find lobby with other players or you can start your own lobby and have friends join it!

name: Burnt Ashes
description: Burning Ashes is a 3D first-person game in the search and horror genre. You are a prisoner trying to escape from prison after you have fallen into a coma, Your job in the prison is to find a tool to open the prison door and then escape from the island After escaping from the island by boat ...

name: Dungeon Rollers
description: Dungeon Rollers is a turn-based dice game, upgrade your skills reroll your dice to defeat the dangerous enemies on your adventure.

name: SpaceShips
description: A tense exciting space battleship shooting game, as the battleship pilot to create their own exclusive battleship.Down with the evil Martians.

name: StellaSpella
description: Help Stella and Miles battle evil trolls and seek out the words hidden in the enchanted forest, In this action packed, split screen co-operative arcade adventure. Remove the lesson from the classroom and place it in the enchanted forest.

name: Lightway Lines
description: In 2061, the desire for seamless interstellar travel continues to grow. Lightway Lines - a modern, specialist airline - is trialing new technology to make space tourism possible for everyone. But in this atmospheric sci-fi ARPG adventure, Rain could end up paying the price for making history.

name: The Call of Paper Plane
description: Welcome to the relaxing adventure game paper airplane. Move the paper plane up and down to avoid obstacles, leap over fields, towns, forests, and many other scenes. Listening to the music, let us go on a fantasy journey with the paper plane.

name: Dead or Mad
description: In the depth of swamps there is a small village in which one by one the villagers began to go missing and go mad, while others had died of disease. You'll have to go through many dangers and find the cause of all these ills.

name: Scooty Shooty
description: Retro 3D hover tank maze combat with friends and bots

name: Astro Fighters 2178
description: Take to your ship to ensure the survival of humanity against an alien force determined to see you fail. Customize your ship with upgrades to raise your chance of success. Take a friend into battle to immediately become a stronger force and watch each others tail

name: Fractured Atmosphere
description: Fractured Atmosphere is an atmospheric VR exploration game. Scour abandoned spaceships and avoid hazards in your search for valuable items. Send crew to dangerous environments where each ship you explore will help to paint a picture of this universe and the people who live here.

name: Gurney to Gurney
description: Casual Tower Defense for the whole family. Let`s win the battle between two wizards! Protect your fortress from the creatures summoned by the black magician and destroy the enemy castle.

name: Zoxel
description: Journey through vast procedurally generated worlds and dungeons to fight monsters. The difficulty increases the farther you venture. Improve your stats to become a powerful god.

name: Spectrum VR
description: Spectrum VR is a puzzle for the passage of which you have to master unusual mechanics in VR. We are inspired by games like The Talos Principle, The Witness, and Antichamber to create.

name: Biologger
description: Biologger is a hard as nails retro platformer. Make your way through unique worlds each with a different and exciting twist. On your journey scan and research creatures to complete your logs. Biologger was developed with speedrunning in mind - how fast can you beat the game?

name: Zodiac Angel
description: Zodiac Angel is a single-player, dark, third-person shooter with some horror elements. Emphasis is placed on gore and creative ways to dispatch of enemies hindering Zodi, the protagonist, from rescuing captive extraterrestrials.

name: Thief Girls Quartet
description: Thief Girls Quartet tells the story of a group of thieving girls who steal valuable treasures that an evil merchant has hidden in a giant tower. The thieving girls can move around freely using wires. Let's find the treasure that lies at the top of the tower together!

name: Adventurers of Tamora
description: Hack and Slash your way through the lighthearted fantasy world of Tamora in this side-scrolling Beat ‘em Up.

name: Coveneth
description: A first-person social game of deception and betrayal, designed to encourage role-playing.

name: Fluvstruck
description: You are a romantic novelist. Sadly - you're absolutely terrible at writing stories, until you meet Yuna, a hopeless young girl who is obsessed with teasing you and putting you to work. Overcome your creative writing block by changing your observations of love into experience.

name: VR Graffiti World
description: Creating beautiful street art would be much more fun without fearing the cops, and now you can with this amazing VR Graffiti World

name: What the Maze
description: "What The Maze" is a horror survival and puzzle game in one. You have to fight for survival as you search for the exit of the huge maze. Register for the experiment today!

name: Leo: The Unexpected Journey
description: Single-player third-person adventure game centered around an unexpected journey of Leo and his companions.To accomplish your vital duty, struggle to overcome hassles on the road. Explore the wild beauty of unknown nature. Most of all,watch over each other.

name: Project Boost
description: Project Boost is a third person action shooter game. It is a single player experience, where you have to skillfully clear your way. You’ll be unlocking new abilities as you progress and use them to your advantage. Unravel the cause behind all this Mayhem.

name: What's Left Behind
description: A tile-based city re-builder set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland.

name: Generals. Positional Warfare
description: Try yourself in the role of General. Make decisions in my hardcore turn-based strategy game with simultaneous moves. You can only guess what the enemy will do.

name: Physics: Optics Table
description: This Physics learning lab experience allows teachers and students to perform experiments with the phenomenon of refraction and reflection of light, also called Snell’s Law.

name: Slurkum
description: The multiplayer survival fantasy you've been looking for! Set in a timeless era, Play how you want to build a character with unique stats, skills, karma, and reputation as you slay monsters, war factions, loot graves, cast spells, hunt down PK or be one yourself!

name: Excavator Simulator VR
description: Ready for work? Excavator Simulator VR gives a short immersive experience of how to operate a 90 tonne excavator from the comfort of your couch. Drive and dig anywhere or complete the tutorials. It is all up to you.

name: We Are Open
description: We Are Open is a shopping simulator game, that makes you rely on your memory and perception skills to successfully help everyone complete their shopping lists. The stocks are randomly generated, so demands change up each round as well. And guess what? The shops swap their places too!

name: Beast Hour
description: Beast Hour is a dark 3rd person PvP game where you run, hunt and fight! Play as Raiders – use parkour, get valuable Arkana and escape from the haunted city. Play as Beasts – track down & kill everyone to become Alpha. There are no allies!

name: Dark North
description: Choose an Archer, Knight, or Mage and fight your friend for the title of King of the North. You need to build the best tactics for buffing your character and join PVP battle when the peace time runs out. Snow, magic and monsters, this awaits you in the Dark North.

name: Private Agent
description: Fire all the bullets! "Private Agent" is a VR gun shooting game. Switch between various weapons and conquer stage bosses. Some weapons can be held in both hands, so you can use two pistols, or handgun and knife for a CQC style fight. Experience the flashy gun action with simple controls!

name: Priest vs. Poltergeist
description: Priest vs. Poltergeist is an action-packed VR vs PC local multiplayer duel between the battle-hardened Priest and a powerful Poltergeist. Play on one PC locally or via Remote Play online.

name: The Gecko Gods
description: Explore a mysterious island as a tiny lizard. Complete ancient puzzles, effortlessly climb cliffs, and eat bugs as you make your way across an island civilization lost to time.

name: Spirit Stone
description: This is a casual adventure game, players can freely choose to go through the gate, hang up, automatic combat, etc., but continue to develop pets and upgrade equipment to make themselves more powerful.By matching pets with different attributes, activate different spirit stones!

name: Grand Horse Attraction
description: Enjoy the fantastic 3D graphics even in endless play mode! No other horse game gives you so many options and total freedom! Experience it yourself with "Grand Horse Attraction". You will love this game!

name: Mercury Particle Sandbox
description: Create Particle Effects, Animations, Banners and Prototypes without programming knowledge in this unique Sandbox. Export Image Sequences, GIFs, APNGs and Sprite Sheets or just enjoy a beautiful day in the sand!

name: Discount Paranormal
description: Blast, shoot, spray, and hunt the damned souls that wander the forests in Discount Paranormal. Go on hunts in the shoes of an independently contracted ghost hunter in this uniquely spooky Roguelike FPS.

name: Color Game
description: Color Game is a puzzle game about getting to the end. Change your color, unlock the path to the exit and avoid enemies along the way.

name: Insect Worlds
description: Immerse yourself in the world of insects. Explore fascinating forests and learn about their way of life. Complete quests and mini-games, fight or collect resources and cards. Admire the microcosm from a completely different perspective and learn new facts about plants and insects.

name: Rushaug: Project Emerald
description: A tactical platformer combining stealth and fast-paced gunplay with action and story-driven missions in a vast explorable world with a large variety of environments. Infiltrate enemy outposts, prevent nuclear war, and uncover the enemy's top secret weapon; Project Emerald.

name: Black Maou & Rainbow Kingdom
description: This is a tower defense 2D game that requires strategy and a little action control. Summon minions with different characteristics to defeat the enemy for you, or equip different skills to take down the enemy yourself. There is no limitation on the ways for you to crush your enemy and claim victory.

name: Eco Warrior Simulator
description: Fight for our planet in Eco Warrior Simulator! Expose environmental problems all over the world and raise global awareness by executing a series of non-violent protests. Infiltrate the least green companies, expose their crimes against nature, and don't get arrested for trespassing!

name: Crashtest
description: Immerse yourself in a beautiful, neon FPS game. Run, jump, swing and wall-run as you shoot bullets all over the place! Run through the levels and destroy every killer-robot you see in your way!

name: Orbtrain: Slot Racing
description: Slot Racing VR game with 10 racetracks. Keep an eye on your car and race from last to first place to complete a level. Enjoy the constantly changing perspective and high speed action as you automatically fly alongside your car.

name: Horse Life 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Compilation Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood + Revelations
description: Sin descripción

name: Brick Breaker Unicorn
description: Brick Breaker Unicorn is a classic arcade game with interesting graphics and unicorn themed.The game is based on the classic "Arknoid" game.Arkanoid is a video slot machine game developed by Taito in 1986.

name: Orange Cast: Prologue
description: Prologue to Orange Cast, an atmospheric adventure in a large-scale setting where Soviet and Western science fiction are combined itself. As a humanity’s elite space trooper, you take on a heroic, action-packed adventure throughout the galaxy.

name: Infiltration: Alone in Combat
description: A Third Person Shooter Game where you have to infiltrate the enemy lines and complete the mission.

name: Daardoa
description: Atmospheric and surreal horror game about day and night cycle.

name: Underponder
description: Underponder is a first-person puzzle/platformer PC-game with a weird and haunting atmosphere, invoking feelings of being lost and alone while wandering in a strange “mindspace” only known as The Underponder.

name: Synth War Tactics
description: A cyber punk turn-based tactics game, customize your team of elite soldiers and lead them to victory across endless battlefields.

name: LetterBound
description: A cooperative spelling adventure playable with to 4 friends!

name: End of Days
description: End of Days is an open world horror survival game set in a time where a virus has mutated human beings into the “infected”. A world where players must work together to survive or eliminate the other survivors.

name: Mind Shadows
description: Mind Shadows is the first standalone game that my friend and I have made since graduating. It is a short psychological horror experience set in the 1980s. You will see multiple cinematic locations in First Person as you slowly gather hints to what is going on.

name: Hyper Strike
description: Hyper Strike is a space shooter on rails with a rogue like twist. Explore the outer space colonies, battle in scenarios, and take on bosses while unlocking upgrades and slowly gaining strength to take on bigger foes.

name: Brandins Buttons
description: Challenge yourself with over 110 increasingly difficult logic puzzles in this classic button pressing game. Explore each one in Free Play Mode or attempt to solve them in Move Limit or Off Only modes. Random Mode lets you create custom puzzles of any size.

name: Desert Raider
description: Desert Raider is a VR action shooting game set-in a post-apocalyptic era. You and your pal Doug are asked to find an unidentified container somewhere in the radioactive zone and deliver it to your boss. Enemy drones are everywhere. Will you survive and complete this last job?

name: A Robot's Journey
description: Embark on A Robot's Journey to becoming a parent and reflecting on childhood memories. Traverse and explore lush landscapes while collecting energy, gathering fragments, overcoming obstacles, and solving puzzles in this 3rd person, exploration, puzzle adventure.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Ryouma de Yuku
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Ryouma de Yuku is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone Honpen
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone Honpen is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: King of Cooking
description: Do you want to have your own food truck? You want to expand your business? Do you like tycoon games? Then, this is the perfect game for you!

name: Evade the Light
description: It is a dark sci-fi FPS, where the main character must find answers to the mysteries of his past in a mysterious anomalous zone, simultaneously fighting the monsters that live there.

name: Touch the Floor
description: A casual, short-burst and fast-paced game where the goal is to keep touching the floor, while blocks keep spawning beneath you. Click them to break them and drop down.

name: Shattered Runes
description: Shattered Runes is a fast-FPS in which you fight your enemies with magic. Choose from 186 unique spells to shape your own playstyle and defeat your opponents.
